title: Darkstream: destroying the oppomedia
author: VD
content_html:
Tonight at 7 PM Eastern I’ll be doing a Darkstream in which we’ll be discussing how to most effectively assist the opposition media continue to self-destruct.

UPDATE: The replay can be viewed here.
